SecurityMeasures: Disallowing access to sensitive files through robots.txt

Steps.Description: Access the /robots.txt file on the target website.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker believes that there may be hidden or restricted content in the /robots.txt file.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker accesses the /robots.txt file by appending /robots.txt to the target website's URL.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker discovers the /ingen/ directory disallowed for all user agents.

Steps.Description: Attempt to access the flag file located at http://challenge.nahamcon.com/ingen/flag.txt.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker believes that the flag file may be located in the /ingen/ directory.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker tries to access the flag file by appending /flag.txt to the /ingen/ directory URL.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully accesses the flag file and obtains the flag.
